articles.title: Celtics rally from 22-point deficit to edge Heat, 98-96
articles.description:
Nikola Vucevic had a double-double in his first game with the Celtics.

The post Celtics rally from 22-point deficit to edge Heat, 98-96 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics overcame a 22-point deficit to defeat the Heat, 98-96.
Nikola Vucevic recorded a double-double in his debut with the Celtics.
This victory boosts Celtics' playoff hopes, energizing local fans and the community.
